alert.note: Alert for Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:02AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northern Grady, northeastern Caddo, northwestern Cleveland, southern Canadian and northwestern McClain Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 356 AM CDT, meteorologists were tracking strong and gusty winds near Weatherford, southeast toward Binger and Hinton. These gusty winds were associated with heat bursts that will continue to progress southeast into western and southern portions of the OKC metro area. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and rising temperatures. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, Moore, Newcastle, Blanchard, Mustang, Tuttle, Hinton, Union City, Minco, Binger, Amber, Bridge Creek, Lookeba, Pocasset, Cogar, Middleberg, and Cedar Lake. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 85 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
